The Stake Guard system is actually designed to prevent cheaters from getting away with their illegitimate rewards. When a cheat is detected, the Stake Guard system allows anyone to claim the cheater's reward, effectively taking it away from the cheater. This means that cheaters no longer have an incentive to cheat, as they will not be able to enjoy the benefits of their illegitimate actions.
